title: Vehicle
description: Vehicle object in the user's account. Endpoint: https://wh.route4me.com/modules/api/v5.0/vehicles

vehicle_id.title: Vehicle id
vehicle_id.descrption: A unique identifcation 32-char string of the vehicle

member_id.title: Member id
member_id.descrption: An unique identification number of the member

is_deleted.title: Is Deleted
is_deleted.description: If true, the vehicle is deleted

vehicle_reg_state_id.title: Vehicle registration state ID
vehicle_reg_state_id.descrption: An ID of the state, where vehicle was registered

vehicle_reg_country_id.title: Vehicle registration country ID
vehicle_reg_country_id.descrption: An ID of the country, where vehicle was registered

vehicle_license_plate.title: Vehicle License Plate
vehicle_license_plate.descrption: A license plate of the vehicle

vehicle_model_year.title: Vehicle Model Year
vehicle_model_year.descrption: A year of the vehicle model

vehicle_year_acquired.title: Vehicle Acquired Year
vehicle_year_acquired.descrption: A year the vehicle was acquired

vehicle_cost_new.title: Vehicle Cost New
vehicle_cost_new.descrption: A cost of the new vehicle

purchased_new.title: Purchased New
purchased_new.description: If true, the vehicle was purchased new

license_start_date.title: License Start Date
license_start_date.descrption: A start date of the license

license_end_date.title: License End Date
license_end_date.descrption: An end date of the license

is_operational.title: Is Operational
is_operational.description: If true, the vehicle is operational

fuel_consumption_city.title: Fuel Consumption City
fuel_consumption_city.descrption: Fuel consumption in the city area

fuel_consumption_highway.title: Fuel Consumption Highway
fuel_consumption_highway.descrption: Fuel consumption in the highway area

fuel_consumption_city_unit.title: Fuel Consumption City Unit
fuel_consumption_city_unit.descrption: Fuel consumption unit in the city area

fuel_consumption_highway_unit.title: Fuel Consumption Highway Unit
fuel_consumption_highway_unit.descrption: Fuel consumption unit in the highway area

mpg_city.title: MPG City
mpg_city.descrption: Miles per gallon in the city area

mpg_highway.title: MPG Highway
mpg_highway.descrption: Miles per gallon in the highway area

fuel_consumption_city_uf_value.title: Fuel Consumption City UF Value
fuel_consumption_city_uf_value.descrption: Fuel consumption UF value in the city area

fuel_consumption_highway_uf_value.title: Fuel Consumption Highway UF Value
fuel_consumption_highway_uf_value.descrption: Fuel consumption UF value in the highway area
